report.title: Species & Occurrence Counts for location boundary
report.description: Gives a total number of species and occurrences recorded in a selected location's boundary.
report.query: SELECT count(DISTINCT ttl.taxon_meaning_id) as species_count, count(DISTINCT o.id) as occurrences_count FROM occurrences o JOIN taxa_taxon_lists ttl ON o.taxa_taxon_list_id = ttl.id AND ttl.deleted=false JOIN samples s on s.id=o.sample_id and s.deleted=false JOIN locations l ON st_intersects(s.geom, l.boundary_geom) AND l.id=#location_id# AND l.deleted=false WHERE o.deleted=false AND o.zero_abundance='f' AND #website_filter# AND (CAST(s.survey_id AS character varying)='#survey_id#' OR '#survey_id#'='') AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR s.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR s.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date)) GROUP BY website_id

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey to return data for, or leave for all surveys
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM surveys

param.name: location_id
param.description: Select the location to return data for
